name: Curse of descension
description:
Description:

You are an adventurer climbing down a dungeon. The dungeon is very old and the ruckus you are causing is making it collapse. You only have one minute to get through each floor before it collapses. Every floor you go down the dungeon curses you making it harder to survive. 

    Controls:

WASD/Arrows

mouse

    Known bugs:

sometimes It wont count the enemies on screen correctly and the door will open early or never

also sometime the slimes will spawn in they same spot and freak very sad
